import React from 'react' import { ALL_BOOKS } from '../queries' import { useQuery } from '@apollo/client' const Books = (props) => { const res = useQuery(ALL_BOOKS) const books = res.data.allBooks if (!props.show) { return null } return (

books

{books.map(a => )}
author published
{a.title} {a.author} {a.published}
) } export default Books
